properties.areaDesc: Northern Valley; Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Northern Phillips; Western Roosevelt; Sheridan
properties.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 14 at 9:19PM MST until January 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Glasgow MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind
chills. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. For the Wind
Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as
low as 50 below zero.

* WHERE...Portions of northeast Montana.

* WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 11 AM MST Wednesday.
For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 11 AM Wednesday to noon MST
Thursday.

* IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause
frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.

* ADDITIONAL INFORMATION...Even though winds will mostly be
around 5 mph or less tonight, the Wind Chill Warning has been
issued due to the significant impacts possible from these
dangerous temperatures.
properties.instruction:
Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you
wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a
hat, and gloves.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM WEDNESDAY TO NOON MST THURSDAY
